info.description: This is the public Twilio REST API.
info.title: Twilio REST API

get.description: Retrieves the media file associated to a given Composition Instance resource identified by a 'CompositionSid'.

parameters.description: The Composition Sid that uniquely identifies the Composition media to fetch.
parameters.name: CompositionSid

parameters.description: Duration in seconds for which the 'redirect_to' URL can be used.
parameters.name: Ttl

parameters.description: Sets the 'Content-Disposition' header of the 'redirect_to' URL.
parameters.name: ContentDisposition

parameters.description: Only show Recordings with the given status.
parameters.name: Status

parameters.description: Only show the Recordings with the given source Sid.
parameters.name: SourceSid

parameters.description: Only show Recordings that have this GroupingSid.
parameters.name: GroupingSid

parameters.description: Only show Recordings that started on or after this ISO8601 date-time with timezone.
parameters.name: DateCreatedAfter

parameters.description: Only show Recordings that started before this ISO8601 date-time with timezone.
parameters.name: DateCreatedBefore

parameters.description: Only show Recordings that have this media type.
parameters.name: MediaType

get.description: Retrieves the media file associated to a given Recording Instance resource identified by a 'RecordingSid'.

parameters.description: The Recording Sid that uniquely identifies the Recording media to fetch.
parameters.name: RecordingSid

parameters.description: Duration in seconds for which the 'redirect_to' URL can be used.
parameters.name: Ttl

parameters.description: Sets the 'Content-Disposition' header of the 'redirect_to' URL.
parameters.name: ContentDisposition

delete.description: Delete a Recording Instance resource identified by a RecordingSid.

parameters.description: The Recording Sid that uniquely identifies the Recording to delete.
parameters.name: Sid

get.description: Returns a single Recording Instance resource identified by a RecordingSid.

parameters.description: The Recording Sid that uniquely identifies the Recording to fetch.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: Only show Rooms with the given status.
parameters.name: Status

parameters.description: Only show Rooms with the provided Name.
parameters.name: UniqueName

parameters.description: Only show Rooms that started on or after this date, given as YYYY-MM-DD.
parameters.name: DateCreatedAfter

parameters.description: Only show Rooms that started before this date, given as YYYY-MM-DD.
parameters.name: DateCreatedBefore

parameters.description: Use Twilio Network Traversal for TURN service.
parameters.name: EnableTurn

parameters.description: Type of room, either peer-to-peer, group-small or group.
parameters.name: Type

parameters.description: Name of the Room.
parameters.name: UniqueName

parameters.description: A URL that Twilio sends asynchronous webhook requests to on every room event.
parameters.name: StatusCallback

parameters.description: HTTP method Twilio should use when requesting the above URL.
parameters.name: StatusCallbackMethod

parameters.description: Maximum number of Participants in the Room.
parameters.name: MaxParticipants

parameters.description: Start Participant recording when connected.
parameters.name: RecordParticipantsOnConnect

parameters.description: An array of video codecs supported when publishing a Track in the Room.
parameters.name: VideoCodecs

parameters.description: Region for the media server in Group Rooms.
parameters.name: MediaRegion

parameters.description: Only show Participants with the given Status.
parameters.name: Status

parameters.description: Only show Participants that connected to the Room using the provided Identity.
parameters.name: Identity

parameters.description: Only show Participants that started after this date, given as an UTC ISO 8601 Timestamp.
parameters.name: DateCreatedAfter

parameters.description: Only show Participants that started before this date, given as an UTC ISO 8601 Timestamp.
parameters.name: DateCreatedBefore

get.description: Returns a list of tracks associated with a given Participant. Only 'currently' Published Tracks are in the list resource.

parameters.description: Unique Room identifier where this Track is published.
parameters.name: RoomSid

parameters.description: Unique Participant identifier that publishes this Track.
parameters.name: ParticipantSid

get.description: Returns a single Track resource represented by 'TrackNameOrSid'.

parameters.description: Unique Room identifier where this Track is published.
parameters.name: RoomSid

parameters.description: Unique Participant identifier that publishes this Track.
parameters.name: ParticipantSid

parameters.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies this resource.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: Set to disconnected to remove participant.
parameters.name: Status

parameters.description: The Room Sid or name that uniquely identifies this resource.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: The Room Sid or name that uniquely identifies this resource.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: Set to completed to end the Room.
parameters.name: Status
